mapper.select: SELECT RANK, LIKE_NO, USER_NO, V_NO, CH_NO, V_DT, V_TY, V_TITLE, UPLOAD_DT, FILE_NM, VFILE_NM FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY VL.V_DT DESC) RANK, VL.*, V_TITLE, UPLOAD_DT, A.FILE_NM, V.FILE_NM VFILE_NM FROM VIDEO_LIKE VL JOIN MEMBER M ON(VL.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN VIDEO V ON(VL.V_NO = V.V_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON(V.V_NO = A.V_NO) WHERE VL.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND V_TY = '북마크') ORDER BY RANK ASC
